title: The Gary Null Show
content:
Prof. <!--more--> Harald Welzer Institute for Advanced Study in Humanities, Essen Germany Topic:  the coming of Climate Wars and violence associated with climate change, resource depletion and mass immigration.

Prof.
Harald Welzer is head of the Center for Interdisciplinary Memory Research at the Institute for the Advanced Study in Humanities in essen Germany, where he pilots the climate change project.  He is also a faculty member at the University of Flensburg and the Executive Director of the Futurzwei Foundation.
